name: Momentum Worldwide
tagline: New York Total Brand Experience Agency
description:
We integrate sponsorship, shopper, design, technology, social, promotions, PR, digital and entertainment and more – in a total brand experience for the modern consumer.
 
Quite simply, our job is to help brands flourish – and we do this as one global agency (within the IPG family of agencies) with more than 30 offices around the world – all of us working together, eager to invent, challenge the norm and set the world on fire.
